channel.title: Rune Essence - Auto Essence
channel.description:
[center][i][b]I'm looking for a script that will.
• Start at the bank. • Teleport at Aurbury. • Walk to the essence mine. • Mine them. • Then walk to the portal. • Walk to the bank. • Bank the items. • Repeat.
Please post a script if it's possible.
Thankyou![/b][/i][/center]

item.title: Rune Essence - Auto Essence
item.dc:creator: @snaes snaes
item.description:
@snaes wrote:

hey this script alsmot works but its for 2.03 it wasnt made by me but i made some changes to it (2 actually). even though 3.15 is out this works and mabye would work with it?? i just cannot get it to bank properly…sry for not a working one but im looking too and cannot find one that works

site: http://www.rs101.info/scripts/scarscript.php?id=108

u need to change the runeshop minimap color to 1611007 on line 89 or the minigame symbol will be chosen
add this between lines 414-415 ill show u the place in the code (only part of code not full)…

procedure walktoauburyrandom;
begin
if(bankcolor=0)then
BankColor:=GetSymbolColor(‘bank’);
writeln(‘BankColor:’+inttostr(BankColor));
begin
mouse(610,88,4,3,true)
flag;
mouse(644,144,4,3,true)
flag;
wait(13000+random(2000)) //by snaes needed wait so had to to move south enough for find magicthingy to work nothing fancy
begin
magicthingy:=GetSymbolColor(‘magic shop’);
writeln(‘magic shop color:’+inttostr(magicthingy));

Read full topic
